NK040(thi)001:1: // gzhung khungs lo rgyus nyung bsdus bzhugs //
NK040(thi)001:3: ka dag lhun grub rdo rje'i gseng lam nas //
NK040(thi)001:4: nges gsang snang bzhi'i 'od gsal mthar phyin kyang //
NK040(thi)001:5: rgyal yum dgongs pa'i gsang mdzod 'dod rgu'i dbyig /
NK040(thi)001:6: sbyin mdzad mkhas grub kun dga' 'bum par 'dud //
NK040(thi)001:7: gangs ljongs yum don gcod kyi shing rta che //
NK040(thi)001:8: ma cig lab sgron dgongs pa'i zab don la //
NK040(thi)001:9: bka' brgyud don brgyud pha brgyud ma brgyud dang //
NK040(thi)001:10: bka' ma gter ma gzhung dang kha 'thor sogs //
NK040(thi)001:11: grags tshul mang yang mdo sngags zung 'jug gi //
NK040(thi)001:12: snyan brgyud bka' bab khu sgom chos seng ste //
NK040(thi)001:13: gzhung dang man ngag kun gyi snying po rnams //
NK040(thi)001:14: khu sgom brgyud srol khongs su 'dus ces grags //
NK040(thi)001:15: de yi brgyud 'dzin sangs rgyas gnyan ston nam //
NK040(thi)001:16: pan chen don yod rdo rje'i gcod kyi gzhung //
NK040(thi)001:17: zab don thugs kyi snying po zhes grags pa'i //
NK040(thi)001:18: bka' bab kahthoga kun dga' 'bum pa ste //
NK040(thi)001:19: 'di la gcod khrid gsal ba'i sgron me dang //
NK040(thi)001:20: gcod gzhung dmigs 'bum mu tig phreng ba dang //
NK040(thi)001:21: lus sbyin gdan thog gcig ma chog phrin dbang //
NK040(thi)001:22: man ngag phran tshegs dang bcas kha tshang ba //
NK040(thi)001:23: 'di 'dra gsar rnying gnyis ka'i phyogs la dkon //
NK040(thi)001:24: mkhas grub karma chags med la sogs kyi //
NK040(thi)001:25: gcod gzhung man ngag kha 'thor mang bzhugs kyang //
NK040(thi)001:26: 'di ni 'o ma'i snying po mar zhun bzhin //
NK040(thi)001:27: kun gyi don tshang kun las khyad par 'phags //
NK040(thi)001:28: de phyir rnying ma'i phyogs kyi chos skad la //
NK040(thi)001:29: bka' gter gnyis ces yongs su grags pa la //
NK040(thi)001:30: ring brgyud bka' ma'i gcod gzhung 'di tsam las //
NK040(thi)001:31: snga 'gyur phyogs la gzhan du ma mchis te //
NK040(thi)001:32: so zur gnubs sogs snga 'gyur rig 'dzin gyi //
NK040(thi)001:33: man ngag nang rgyud sde gsum dang 'brel ba'i //
NK040(thi)001:34: gdams srol skyo ston bsod nams bla ma dang //
NK040(thi)001:35: kun mkhyen dam pa'i snyan brgyud gzhung 'dir tshang //
NK040(thi)001:36: chos rab 'byed pa'i rnam dpyod gru rdzing gis //
NK040(thi)001:37: gcod gzhung bka' gter rgya mtsho'i 'jing brgal yang //
NK040(thi)001:38: snying po'i yang zab 'dod 'byung yid bzhin dbang //
NK040(thi)001:39: 'di las lhag pa'i gzhung bzang rnyed srid dam //
NK040(thi)001:40: des na sgrub brgyud 'di la mos rnams kyis //
NK040(thi)001:41: zab yangs chos mdzod kun gyi dbyig nor las //
NK040(thi)001:42: khyad 'phags klu dbang gtsug gi rgyan mchog bzhin //
NK040(thi)001:43: gces par 'dzin la 'chad spel byi dor rem //
NK040(thi)001:44: lhag bsam 'o ma'i chu gter las thon pa'i //
NK040(thi)001:45: gdams zab kha tshang bcud dril ri bong can //
NK040(thi)001:46: 'chad spel yar gyi tshes la co 'dri ba'i //
NK040(thi)001:47: phrin las nya rgyas 'od dkar kun khyab shog /
